Electric scooter: Another option is to use an electric scooter, which can provide a faster and more efficient mode of transportation for short to medium distances.
Train: Trains are an excellent option for long-distance travel, as they are often more comfortable and environmentally friendly than cars.
Bus: Buses are another option for long-distance travel, as they can be more affordable than trains and often have more frequent routes.
Carpooling: Carpooling with friends or family members can be a cost-effective and environmentally friendly way to travel long distances without a car.
Ride-sharing services: Ride-sharing services like Uber or Lyft can also be used for long-distance travel, although they may not be as environmentally friendly as other options.
